Helper: Filter and finalize tidy plot data

Source: R/make_Kusko_figure_C.R
dot-prepare_plot_df.Rd

Joins harvest summaries with zero-harvest probabilities and filters by selectivity.

Usage

.prepare_plot_df(summary_df, zero_harvest_df, selectivity_filter)

Arguments

summary_df

Output of .make_tidy_summary().

zero_harvest_df

Output of .compute_zero_harvest().

selectivity_filter

Which selectivity level to keep (e.g., "unselective").

Value

Final tidy data.frame for plotting.

On this page
